DataElement.preferredName: Genetic Variation Gene Function Alteration Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to describe the genetic variant which alters gene function.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Genetic Variation Gene Mutation Gene Function Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Genetic Variation consists of deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of an individual from that typical of the group to which the individual belongs, or deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of offspring from that of its parents._The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA._A term that expresses the function of a gene product._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Genetic Variation consists of deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of an individual from that typical of the group to which the individual belongs, or deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of offspring from that of its parents.

Concepts.definition: Genetic Variation consists of deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of an individual from that typical of the group to which the individual belongs, or deviation(s) in the nucleotide sequence of the genetic material of offspring from that of its parents.

Property.preferredDefinition: The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA.:A term that expresses the function of a gene product.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: The result of any gain, loss or alteration of the sequences comprising a gene, including all sequences transcribed into RNA.
A term that expresses the function of a gene product.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer.

DataElementConcept.origin: VHI-10:Voice Handicap Index, 10 Items. Rosen, C, Lee, A, Osborne, J, Zullo, T, and Murry, T.,Development and Validation of the Voice Handicap Index- 10.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
